meanings.sent1: She outfasted her friend during Ramadan.
meanings.sent2: He outfasted his siblings during the fasting period.
meanings.sent3: The race was on to see who could outfast the others.
meanings.sent5: The marathon runner outfasted everyone else in the competition.

meanings.definition: Having fasted longer than someone else.
meanings.sent1: The outfasted individual was feeling weak.
meanings.sent2: She was the most outfasted among the group.
meanings.sent3: The outfasted team finally broke their fast together.
meanings.sent4: His outfasted state made him appreciate food more.
meanings.sent5: The outfasted group celebrated the end of their fasting journey.
